impact_levels.title: Level 1: You can describe what you do and why it matters, logically, coherently and convincingly
Level 2: You capture data that shows positive change, but you cannot confirm you caused this
Level 3: You can demonstrate causality through a quasi-experimental design
Level 4: You can demonstrate causality through a randomised control trial
Level 5: You have one + independent replication evaluations that confirms these conclusions

Level 4: You can demonstrate causality through a randomised control trial

Level 1: You can describe what you do and why it matters, logically, coherently and convincingly

Level 1: Our work has not informed what future direction we take or meaningfully progressed our understanding of the problem
Level 2: Our work has helped us learn more about the problem, but not informed what future direction our work takes
Level 3: Our work has helped us prove or disprove a hypothesis that opens up avenues for future work, or closes off avenues
Level 4: Our work has given us significantly more confidence in our direction of travel, or helped us make a change in approach that we can be more sure will have impact
Level 5: Our work has answered a foundational research question that unlocks new avenues of exploration that could make a big difference to our missions

impact_rigours.title: Cross-sectional internal survey: % of respondents say the research has proved/disproved a hypothesis and informed future direction of their work
Longitudinal internal survey: % of respondents say the research has proved/disproved a hypothesis and informed future direction of their work, and continues to inform their work
Quality and strength of the result

impact_levels.title: Level 1: very weak result based on approach similar to Level 1 of Nesta's Standards of Evidence
Level 2: weak result based on approach similar to Level 2 of Nesta's Standards of Evidence
Level 3: moderate result based on approach similar to Level 3 of Nesta's Standards of Evidence
Level 4: strong result based on approach similar to Level 4 of Nesta's Standards of Evidence
Level 5: very strong result based on approach similar to Level 5 of Nesta's Standards of Evidence

impact_rigours.title: Learning published online and legitimised by key sector bodies

impact_levels.title: Level 1: Our work has not registered as credible with key stakeholders and has not shifted the conversation
Level 2: Our work has been noticed by others, but it has not started to inform their understanding of the problem or approach to tackle it
Level 3: Our work has has been discussed in niche areas of the sector, and they have made small changes to their approach based on the new evidence
Level 4: Our work has been picked up by a few key players in the sector, and they have made some key changes to their approach based on the new evidence
Level 5: Our work has made a meaningful contribution to the most influential stakeholders' understanding of the problem, and they have changed their approach to the problem in line with the our work

impact_rigours.title: # people attended an event to share learning / evidence
# references to research by key sector bodies
# academic citations of a published paper

impact_levels.title: Level 1: Our work has not built new or maintained existing relationships that support our missions
Level 2: Our work has maintained existing relationships that help raise our profile
Level 3: Our work has maintained and strengthened existing relationships that can make a difference to our missions
Level 4: Our work has built new, meaningful relationships with people or organisations that can make a difference to our missions
Level 5: Our work has built novel cross-sector coalitions that have the potential to turbocharge our missions

impact_rigours.title: # unique views of a joint publication

impact_levels.title: Level 1: org has <25% reach compared with Nesta
Level 2: org has 25-50% reach compared with Nesta
Level 3: org has 50-100% reach compared with Nesta
Level 4: org has 100-200% reach compared with Nesta
Level 5: org has >200% reach compared with Nesta

impact_rigours.title: # of orgs partnered with through coalition + potential reach

impact_levels.title: Level 1: we have partnered with 1 small organisation (cf Nesta)
Level 2: we have established a coalition with 2-3 small organisations (cf Nesta)
Level 3: we have established a coalition with 1-3 medium sized organisations (cf Nesta)
Level 4: we have established a coalition with 2-3 large organisations (cf Nesta)
Level 5: we have established a coalition with over 5 large organisations (cf Nesta)
Level 1: Our work has not changed the target populations perceptions in any noticeable way
Level 2: Our work has made a small target population slightly more favourable towards our desired position
Level 3: Our work has made a sizable target population more favourable towards our desired position
Level 4: Our work has made a large and / or influential target population much more favourable towards our desired position
Level 5: Our work has made a very large and / or highly influential target population highly favourable towards our desired position

impact_rigours.title: Cross-sectional survey: % of respondents to a survey agree with x position after activity is complete
Longitudinal survey: % of respondents to a survey agree with x position after activity is complete, and tested over time

impact_levels.title: Level 1: Our work has not been adopted by others at all
Level 2: Our work has been picked up by a few niche organisations, but they aren't doing things differently because of it
Level 3: Our work has a small community of supporters, and they are big advocates for it and / or have changed their practice, but is unlikely to scale larger
Level 4: Our work has been adopted by some influential supporters who have a big reach and could scale it
Level 5: Our work has been adopted by the all the key players in the sector, and their adoption has led to an outsized impact on our mission goal

impact_rigours.title: Cross-sectional survey: % of respondents to a survey say they have adopted x practice after activity is complete
Longitudinal survey: % of respondents to a survey say they have adopted x practice after activity is complete, and tested over time
# key sector bodies making reference to our work in their practice materials
Size of organisation that has formally signed up to or adopted a Nesta advocated practice

impact_levels.title: Level 1: org has <25% reach compared with Nesta
Level 2: org has 25-50% reach compared with Nesta
Level 3: org has 50-100% reach compared with Nesta
Level 4: org has 100-200% reach compared with Nesta
Level 5: org has >200% reach compared with Nesta
Level 1: 1 stakeholder AND / OR >10 stakeholders with little influence
Level 2: 2-3 stakeholders AND / OR 5-10 stakeholders with some influence
Level 4: 5-10 stakeholders AND / OR 2-3 stakeholders with large influence
Level 5: >10 stakeholders AND / OR 2-3 stakeholders with outsized influence

impact_rigours.title: # unique views of a Nesta advocated policy position in a national / sector relevant news outlet
# mentions of Nesta advocated policy position made in hansard / central and local govt policy documents

impact_levels.title: Level 1: 1 stakeholder AND / OR >10 stakeholders with little influence
Level 2: 2-3 stakeholders AND / OR 5-10 stakeholders with some influence
Level 4: 5-10 stakeholders AND / OR 2-3 stakeholders with large influence
Level 5: >10 stakeholders AND / OR 2-3 stakeholders with outsized influence
